Two step collagenase perfusion

1.       Anesthetize a mouse with isoflurane

2.       Cut the center of the abdominal wall and

Expose the portal vein

3.       Insert a butterfly needle into the portal vein and

Fix it with a clamp

4.       Turn on the peristatic pump and

Cut the inferior vena cava

5.       Perfuse the liver with 25 ml of pre-perfusion solution at 6 ml/min

6.       Perfused 40 ml of the perfusion solution at 3 ml/min

7.       Transfer the liver to a petri dish

8.       Peel off the liver capsule and

Dissociate hepatocytes using two tweezers

9.       Transfer the undigested tissue to a 6 cm dish and

Keep on ice
